titles.title: Motorsports Tax Fairness Act
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to make permanent the depreciation classification of motorsports entertainment complexes.

action.text: Introduced in the Senate. Read the first time. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under Read the First Time.

calendar.text: Read the second time. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 454.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S13680-13681)

bill.summary:
10/26/2007--Introduced.
Motorsports Tax Fairness Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to make permanent the classification, for depreciation purposes, of any motorsports entertainment complex as seven-year property.
